mdxSource.renderedOutput:
One where everyone meets in Jaipur.

The first year at IITK ended on a random weekend, entirely remotely, thanks to the pandemic. While zoom meets were the only means of interaction (sucks), we had other plans this sem break. Imagine being free to explore finally after 4 years of preparing for something which isn't even making sense at this point of time, this was it.

Enough said, this blog would be more of a photo dump, so yeah, here we go:

Albert Hall post dusk
Amer Fort

Yeah its not just about the 40°C here

A lot of food? A LOT OF FOOD.

"Azkaban noises"

One from inside Hawa Mahal

Jantar Mantar

From the top (Nahargarh Fort)

Amigos ❤️

Until next time...

frontMatter.title: Life update - Travelling post/amidst(?) pandemic
frontMatter.summary: The one where everyone meets in Jaipur.
